INktParam Interface Reference

Exposes methods for accessing function call parameter information. More...

import"DeviareCOM.idl";

Detailed Description

Exposes methods for accessing function call parameter information.

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT INktParam::Address ( [out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal)
get

Get the remote address where this parameter resides.

Parameters
[in,out]pValPointer to receive the address value.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
HRESULT INktParam::ArrayMaxHint ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
getbound

If parameter is an array, get a hint of the upper bound index.

Parameters
[in,out]pValPointer to receive array upper bound index value.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
Remarks
This function will return a negative value if the array upper bound is not known or does not exist.
HRESULT INktParam::BasicType ( [out, retval] eNktDboFundamentalType *  pVal)
get

Get the basic type of this parameter.

Parameters
[in,out]pValPointer to receive the class value; one of eNktDboFundamentalType enumeration.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
HRESULT INktParam::ByteVal ( [out, retval] unsigned char *  pVal)
get

Read parameter as an unsigned byte value.

Parameters
[in,out]pValPointer to unsigned char to receive parameter value.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER of pVal pointer value is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.

set

HRESULT INktParam::ByteValAt ( [in] LONG  index,
[out, retval] unsigned char *  pVal 
)
get

Read parameter as a unsigned-char value from the specified array index.

Parameters
indexZero-based index.
[in,out]pValPointer to unsigned-char to receive parameter value.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER of pVal pointer value is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if specified index is invalid.
E_FAIL on general error.

newValueThe new value.

E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktParam::CastTo ( [in] BSTR  newType,
[out, retval] INktParam **  ppParam 
)

Do a static cast of the parameter into a new type.

Parameters
newTypeName of the target type.
[in,out]ppParamAddress of pointer to receive a interface for the newly-typed parameter.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if ppParam is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if provided string is empty.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if the specified type cannot be found in the Deviare database.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if the new parameter could not be created due to memory error.

HRESULT INktParam::Evaluate ( [out, retval] INktParam **  ppParam)

Dereference a pointer parameter and returns a proper interface.

Parameters
[in,out]ppParamPointer to address to receive the dereferenced parameter interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if ppParam is NULL.
E_FAIL if error or this parameter is not of pointer-type.
HRESULT INktParam::Field ( [in] VARIANT  indexOrName,
[out, retval] INktParam **  ppParam 
)

Get a field from struct or union typed parameter.

Parameters
indexOrNameA variant specifying which field to extract; valid type is either numeric index or field name string.
[in,out]ppParamAdress of pointer to receive field parameter interface, if any.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is null.
E_INVALIDARG if field index or name is not valid.
E_FAIL if this parameter is not struct or union, or general error.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if field not found.
HRESULT INktParam::Fields ( [out, retval] INktParamsEnum **  ppParamsEnum)

Get a collection with fields of a struct or union typed parameter.

Parameters
[in,out]ppParamsEnumAddress of pointer to receive a parameter enumerator interface to access the collection.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is null.

HRESULT INktParam::FullEvaluate ( [out, retval] INktParam **  ppParam)

Recursively dereference this pointer parameter.

Parameters
[in,out]ppParamPointer to address to receive the dereferenced parameter interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if ppParam is NULL.
E_FAIL if error or this parameter is not of pointer-type.
HRESULT INktParam::GuidString ( [out, retval] BSTR *  pVal)
get

Cast this parameter as a GUID, IID, CLSID or UUID struct and retrieves its value.

Parameters
[in,out]pValPointer to string to receive GUID value.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided string buffer has insufficient space to store GUID identifier.
Remarks
If the parameter type is not GUID (or compatible type), the function returns S_OK and clears string argument.
HRESULT INktParam::IndexedEvaluate ( [in] LONG  index,
[out, retval] INktParam **  ppParam 
)

Dereference the pointer stored at specified index if the parameter is an array.

Parameters
indexZero-based index.
[in,out]ppParamPointer to address to receive the dereferenced parameter interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_INVALIDARG if specified index is invalid.
E_POINTER if ppParam is NULL.
E_FAIL if general error, this parameter is not array, or the stored array value cannot be dereferenced.
HRESULT INktParam::IntResourceString ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Check if this parameter is an encoded resource string.

Parameters
[in,out]pValpVal Pointer to receive boolean VARIANT_TRUE if this parameter is an encoded resource string.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.

Read parameter as a signed pointer-sized integral value.

Parameters
[in,out]pValPointer to signed, pointer-sized integral variable to receive parameter value.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktParam::PointerVal ( [in] my_ssize_t  newValue)
set

Write a signed pointer-sized integral parameter value.

Parameters
newValueThe new value.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktParam::ReadString ( [out, retval] BSTR *  pVal)

Read an ANSI or Wide string from the parameter.

Parameters
[in,out]pValPointer to store the function name string.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_INVALIDARG if maxChars is invalid.
E_POINTER if provided string pointer is NULL.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided string buffer has insufficient space.
HRESULT INktParam::ReadStringN ( [in] LONG  maxChars,
[out, retval] BSTR *  pVal 
)

Read an ANSI or Wide string from the parameter specifying a maximum number of characters.

Parameters
maxCharsThe character count to read.
[in,out]pValPointer to store the function name string.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_INVALIDARG if maxChars is invalid.
E_POINTER if provided string pointer is NULL.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided string buffer has insufficient space.

HRESULT INktParam::WriteString ( [in] BSTR  str,
[in] VARIANT_BOOL  isAnsi,
[in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_TRUE)] VARIANT_BOOL  writeNul 
)

Write a string as parameter value.

Parameters
strThe string buffer.
isAnsiVARIANT_TRUE if str points to an ANSI string.
writeNulSpecify VARIANT_TRUE to write the NULL string terminator.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_INVALIDARG if maxChars is invalid.
E_POINTER if provided string pointer is NULL.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided string buffer has insufficient space.
